title: An Act relative to the use of virtual credit cards by dental insurance providers

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Scanlon of North Attleborough, a petition (subject to Joint Rule 12) of Adam J. Scanlon relative to the use of virtual credit cards by dental insurance providers.  Financial Services.
